name: Mortum Pyro
description:
Mortum Pyro

Born from the kindles of an abandoned campfire, Little pyro needs to survive the deadly night! The monsters of the forest want to sleep and they do NOT appreciate the light that pyro emits. Defend yourself in this spooky topdown shooter

Info: What do i press after download in order to play? Controls (controller Required): Joysticks:  

Left joystick = Movement left, right, up, down.

Right joystick = Aim direction.  

Shoulder buttons:  

Left Trigger = Triple shot

Right Trigger = Single shot

Left Shoulder Button = Fire sneeze

Right Shoulder Button = Guard ability  

Regular buttons:  

A button = Interact (for shopkeeper / UI)  

Extra:  

Start button = Pause Menu
